game.name: Unwanted Dungeon
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A tactical survivorslike with classic RPG essence: unique builds, dual combat styles per class, rare loot, and semi-procedural level generation. Fast-paced action meets progression freedom and permadeath in a dark fantasy roguelike. Welcome to Unwanted Dungeon.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A tactical survivorslike with classic RPG essence: unique builds, dual combat styles per class, rare loot, and semi-procedural level generation. Fast-paced action meets progression freedom and permadeath in a dark fantasy roguelike. Welcome to Unwanted Dungeon.
